metadata.synopsis: Started when passing an arcana check to discern the meaning of the sigil on the transformation machine above its respective lever. In this case transforming the people in the pods into mindflayers, i.e. 'perfecting' them

0.speaker: Player
0.context: NodeContext: per-FECT, the verb, not 'perfect' the adjective
